0.0.1.name: wordpress/evdbfiles
0.0.1.description: Have small amount of HDD space on Your server ? Now it's no problem (at least if You have db space unlimited) This plugin will store all uploded files into DB. I'm using it for my photo gallery (http://marek.bisz.pl). There will be further features (file metadata, geolocation info, kml output for google earth etc)
